Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.omni.projetos.controller.projeto.HomeController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="home")
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class to list, edit and delete projects.

        @GetMapping
public java.lang.String home(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                          java.lang.Long id,
                                          @PageableDefault(sort="id",direction=ASC,page=0,size=5)
                                          org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable,
                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Method for return all projects by pagination or a project by the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - Long - project id (optional)
        pageable - Pageable - pageable to controller projects return
